body.p: An entity shall derecognise a financial asset when, and only when:

li.p: the contractual rights to the cash flows from the financial asset expire, or
it transfers the financial asset as set out in paragraphs 3.2.4 and 3.2.5 and the transfer qualifies for derecognition in accordance with paragraph 3.2.6.

body.p: (See paragraph 3.1.2 for regular way sales of financial assets.)
